verses.verse: הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah become עָלַי֮ <WH5921> 'a-Lai and יַד־ <WH3027> yad- The hand יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נִי <WH3318> vai-yo-tzi-'E-ni was upon me and carried me out בְר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach in the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיְנִיחֵ֖נִי <WH5117> vay-ni-Che-ni and set me down בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst הַבִּקְעָ֑ה <WH1237> hab-bik-'Ah; of the valley וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> ve-Hi and it was מְלֵאָ֥ה <WH4392> me-le-'Ah which [was] full עֲצָמֽוֹת׃ <WH6106> a-tza-Mot. of bones

וְהֶעֱבִירַ֥נִי <WH5674> ve-he-'e-vi-Ra-ni And caused me to pass עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem among סָבִ֣יב׀ <WH5439> sa-Viv by them round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; about וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold רַבּ֤וֹת <WH7227> rab-Bot many מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> me-'Od and behold [there were] very עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- among פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei in the open הַבִּקְעָ֔ה <WH1237> hab-bik-'Ah, valley וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and lo יְבֵשׁ֥וֹת <WH3002> ye-ve-Shot dry מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. and lo [they were] very

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הֲתִחְיֶ֖ינָה <WH2421> ha-tich-Yei-nah live הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> ha-'a-tza-Mot can these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; these וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar ;And I answered אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai O Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> ya-Da-'e-ta. thou knowest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Again he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve unto me Prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> ha-'a-tza-Mot upon these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; these וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, about הָעֲצָמוֹת֙ <WH6106> ha-'a-tza-mOt bones הַיְבֵשׁ֔וֹת <WH3002> hay-ve-Shot, unto them O ye dry שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD לָעֲצָמ֖וֹת <WH6106> la-'a-tza-Mot unto these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; to these הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold אֲנִ֜י <WH589> 'a-Ni I מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> me-Vi to enter בָכֶ֛ם va-Chem ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach Behold I will cause breath וִחְיִיתֶֽם׃ <WH2421> vich-yi-Tem. into you and ye shall live

וְנָתַתִּי֩ <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will lay עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem and גִּדִ֜ים <WH1517> gi-Dim sinews וְֽהַעֲלֵתִ֧י <WH5927> ve-ha-'al-Ti upon you and will bring up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem on בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> ba-Sar, flesh וְקָרַמְתִּ֤י <WH7159> ve-ka-ram-Ti upon you and cover עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem with ע֔וֹר <WH5785> or, you with skin וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and put בָכֶ֛ם va-Chem ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach breath וִחְיִיתֶ֑ם <WH2421> vich-yi-Tem; in you and ye shall live וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

וְנִבֵּ֖אתִי <WH5012> ve-nib-Be-ti So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I צֻוֵּ֑יתִי <WH6680> tzuv-Vei-ti; as I was commanded וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- there was ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol there was a noise כְּהִנָּֽבְאִי֙ <WH5012> ke-hin-na-ve-'I and as I prophesied וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold רַ֔עַשׁ <WH7494> Ra-'ash, and behold a shaking וַתִּקְרְב֣וּ <WH7126> vat-tik-re-Vu came together עֲצָמ֔וֹת <WH6106> a-tza-Mot, and the bones עֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> 'E-tzem bone אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עַצְמֽוֹ׃ <WH6106> atz-Mo. to his bone

וְרָאִ֜יתִי <WH7200> ve-ra-'I-ti And when I beheld וְהִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and גִּדִים֙ <WH1517> gi-Dim lo the sinews וּבָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> u-va-Sar and the flesh עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah, came up וַיִּקְרַ֧ם <WH7159> vai-yik-Ram covered עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and ע֖וֹר <WH5785> or upon them and the skin מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> mil-Ma-'e-lah; them above וְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach but [there was] no breath אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein there בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve he unto me Prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָר֑וּחַ <WH7307> ha-Ru-ach; unto the wind הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- son אָ֠דָם <WH120> 'A-dom of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָר֜וּחַ <WH7307> ha-Ru-ach to the wind כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD מֵאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> me-'ar-Ba' from the four רוּחוֹת֙ <WH7307> ru-chOt winds בֹּ֣אִי <WH935> Bo-'i Come הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> ha-Ru-ach, O breath וּפְחִ֛י <WH5301> u-fe-Chi and breathe בַּהֲרוּגִ֥ים <WH2026> ba-ha-ru-Gim upon these slain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these וְיִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <WH2421> ve-Yich-Yu. that they may live

וְהִנַּבֵּ֖אתִי <WH5012> ve-hin-nab-Be-ti So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he צִוָּ֑נִי <WH6680> tziv-Va-ni; as he commanded וַתָּבוֹא֩ <WH935> vat-ta-Vo came בָהֶ֨ם va-Hem הָר֜וּחַ <WH7307> ha-Ru-ach me and the breath וַיִּֽחְי֗וּ <WH2421> vai-yich-Yu, into them and they lived וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <WH5975> vai-ya-'am-Du and stood up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> rag-lei-Hem, upon their feet חַ֖יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil army גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol great מְאֹד־ <WH3966> me-'od- an exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. an exceedingly ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer Then he said אֵלַי֒ <WH413> 'e-Lai to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> ha-'a-tza-Mot these bones הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- are the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit are the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah; like הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim, behold they say יָבְשׁ֧וּ <WH3001> ya-ve-Shu are dried עַצְמוֹתֵ֛ינוּ <WH6106> atz-mo-Tei-nu Our bones וְאָבְדָ֥ה <WH6> ve-'a-ve-Dah is lost תִקְוָתֵ֖נוּ <WH8615> tik-va-Te-nu and our hope נִגְזַ֥רְנוּ <WH1504> nig-Zar-nu we are cut off לָֽנוּ׃ <WH99999> La-nu.

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֨א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold אֲנִ֨י <WH589> 'a-Ni I פֹתֵ֜חַ <WH6605> fo-Te-ach I will open אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6913> kiv-ro-tei-Chem, your graves וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֥י <WH5927> ve-ha-'a-lei-Ti and cause you to come up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6913> mik-kiv-ro-tei-Chem out of your graves עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> 'am-Mi; Behold O my people וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ti and bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat you into the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD בְּפִתְחִ֣י <WH6605> be-fit-Chi when I have opened אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6913> kiv-ro-tei-Chem, your graves וּבְהַעֲלוֹתִ֥י <WH5927> u-ve-ha-'a-lo-Ti and brought you up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6913> mik-kiv-ro-tei-Chem out of your graves עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> 'am-Mi. O my people

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And shall put רוּחִ֤י <WH7307> ru-Chi my spirit בָכֶם֙ va-Chem וִחְיִיתֶ֔ם <WH2421> vich-yi-Tem, in you and ye shall live וְהִנַּחְתִּ֥י <WH3240> ve-hin-nach-Ti and I shall place אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and אַדְמַתְכֶ֑ם <WH127> 'ad-mat-Chem; you in your own land וִידַעְתֶּ֞ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem then shall ye know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֧י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti have spoken וְעָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ti [it] and performed נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- [it] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD פ Peh
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Moreover thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man קַח־ <WH3947> kach- take לְךָ֙ le-Cha עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz stick אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, thee one וּכְתֹ֤ב <WH3789> u-che-To and write עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lav on לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> li-hu-Dah, upon it For Judah וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei and for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel; חֲבֵרֹו cha-ve-rov כחֲבֵרָ֑יו <WH2270> cha-ve-Rav; companion קוּלְקַח֙ <WH3947> u-le-Kach then take עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz stick אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, another וּכְת֣וֹב <WH3789> u-che-Tov and write עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, on לְיוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> le-yo-Sef upon it For Joseph עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz the stick אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit and [for] all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel; חֲבֵרֹו cha-ve-rov כחֲבֵרָֽיו׃ <WH2270> cha-ve-Rav. companion ק

וְקָרַ֨ב <WH7126> ve-ka-Rav And join אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> 'o-Tam אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> 'e-Chad them one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> 'e-Chad to another לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> le-'Etz stick אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; into one וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu may become לַאֲחָדִ֖ים <WH259> la-'a-cha-Dim and they shall become one בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha. in thine hand

וְכַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ve-cha-'a-Sher after יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru shall speak אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha, about בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei And when the children עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha of thy people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; unto thee saying הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> ha-lo- not תַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> tag-Gid Wilt thou not shew לָ֖נוּ La-nu מָה־ <WH4100> mah- what אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh another לָּֽךְ׃ lach
